CustomField.description: The offset used to calculate 'Shipment Date From' from 'In-Store Date From', if the Timeframe Determination Policy is not Manual.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the offset used to calculate the 'Shipment Date From' from 'In-Store Date From' if Timeframe Determination Policy is 'Automatic Simple'. Negative values are used to define an earlier date.
CustomField.label: Shipment Date From Offset
